I really enjoyed this game but the anti cheat system isnt the best. I started playing csgo to take a break from valorant since most valorant pros come from this game. I recommend this game but be careful of hackers.

So basically I got competitive cool down because i shot my friend at spawn and i had a 24 hour cool down and i waited to play after 24 hours and after that as soon as i got on my next game i accidentally shot someone at spawn complete miss click and then BOOM 7 day cool down??? that's fucked CS-GO should go fuck itself im a prime member that is a stupid rule and that is not even the worse part... AFTER those seven days "1 week" i got onto another game and my friends vote kick someone and they all voted yes so i voted yes "f1" then i called a terrorist time out so i could wait for my afk mate and then after that game finished BAM!!!! there is a 7 day cool down again??? right after one game it said i voted on too many things?? csgo you are losing players because of how autistic and dumb you are for putting competitive cool downs so easy on prime members. So the moral of the review is cs-go competitive cool downs should go fuck themselves and if you don't think what i want is fair you should go fuck yourself too. thank you for reading.
genial para compartir con tus amigos.

CS GO is still Counter-Strike with its gorgeous moments. Be an attacker with a P90. Be the last survivor and feel like teammates are watching over your shoulder, pinning all their hopes on you. The feeling that it increases the safety of both yours and your companions. Knife battle for your honor. Accidentally blind your team with a flash grenade thrown in the wrong place and kill everyone with it. Yes, it's all still included. Summing up, I can only say one thing: go, go, go!
